CustomField.description: Used to track referenceable customers. Set to "Willing" by automation when CSAT response is received and KPU.Onboarding_CSAT_Reference_Decision_Maker__c =TRUE or KPU.Onboarding_CSAT_Reference_Primary_User__c = TRUE. Set manually to Willing or Not Willing if customer is confirmed to consent or disagree to providing a reference. Blank field indicates not confirmed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set this field when reference disposition is confirmed. Willing = customer agreed to provide reference; Not Willing = customer declined to provide reference; Blank = unconfirmed
CustomField.label: Confirmed Reference Disposition
